text: chuti manike tharam mama ahinsaka na
suryayata wada aasannayen athi wasthu wada wegayen gaman karayi.
ponseka kiyanne athadanguwata path demala piris sambandhayen jayasuriya anisi lesa katayuthu kala bawa thamata warthawu bawayi.
mema kalaya sathuru karadara athi wana athara roga pida ha asthana biya athi wanu atha.
thiththa kunuharupa amu amuwema liyala na.
2015 pebarawari masa 23 10:10:30
thaman wadiyen aasa karana blog ekaka link ekak pahala satahan karanna..
ee para lathath weda mahaththayagen ahala thiyenne mage kakulwala aatharayitis rogayatath prathikara karanna puluwanda kiyala.
aagamika sanhindiyawa pilibandawa richang pathiranayan dakwu unanduwa saha sahayogaya nisa kisima awakapena aagamika gatum thaththwayak in pasu sidu nowuni.
eseth nathnam wenath bhutha balapamak da ?
tikak amathaka wena gathiya ehemath thibba.
ek dinaka sinuwara uthsawayaka di mata hamuwunu kathuwarayek thaman kawi pothak liya merata di ma mudranaya kala bawa pawasa ehi pitapathak milata ganne dayi wimasi ya.
eyage wartha okkoma.
eheth sidu wu wishala pramanaye mudal athurudanwim nisa thawamath sewille pasu wethi.assaka mullaka pawa mudal sangawa thibedayi soya balathi.
gamperaliya nawa kathawen, menm apegama, upanda sita madolduwa yana kruthiwalin wikramasinhayan koggala gami parisaraya ha ehi sundarathwaya hariapuruwata wistharakota aththeya.
warthamanayedi boho denekuge awadhanaya eksath jathika pakshayen wathman aanduwata ekwana manthriwarun wetha yomuwa thibe.
hama kandayamakata ma hamuduruwaru paha bagin bhara karala thibuna.
eekath eka hethuwak wenna athi.

kolambaa jathika rohale pa්rathikara labamin siti ehimiyan rohalen baharawa yamata sudanam wu awasthawedi polis athadanguwata gena atha.pasugiya kalaye jathika samagiya wenuwen muslim jathikayan ha ekwa kolambaa nipon hotalayedi madhya sakachchuawak pawathwannata giyawita eeta kadawadunu bodu bala senawe gnyanasara himi watarauka himiyantath ehi siti anek himiwaruntath siwuru galawa damana bawata tharjanaya kota tab pariganayakin paharadennatada uthsaha kaleya.

shri lankawe aga­ma­thi­wa­raya lesa ranil wikra­ma­sinha mathi­thuma yali path kirima pili­banda rata­wal gana­na­wa­kin suba pathum pala eekiya rajyayaka deshapalana wisandumakata kapa wenawa eekiya rajyayak thula hindimin sanhindiyawa mul kara gath deshapalana wisandumakata elambaena bawa agramathya ranil mahanuwara pradesha kipayakata heta jalaya kape mahanuwara – kundasala, araththana jala pawithragaraye prathisanskarana katayuththak hethuwen heta (19) pradesha abhinawa agamathi ranil wikramasinha mahatha janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahatha idiriye janadhipathi lekam ranil wikramasinha mahathata agamathi dhuraya thama laba dunne parlimenthu sampradayata saha prajathanthrawadayata garu karana

polisiye paya 12 k randawa thabagath bawath, me nisa thama me sambandhayen aarakshaka lekamwarayata ha manawa himikam karyalayata danum dena bawath, jathika mosthara madhyasthanaye sabhapathi mashal mahatha "diwayina" pradhana karyalayata eeye (20 wanida) pamina sandahan kaleya.
eheth ratata balapana thiranathmaka awasthawala sesu bhikshun wahanselata da nayakathwaya demin peramuna gathha.
